keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Mr. 3 Battle Continues
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles Mr. 3 using wax hammers and debuts the Gomu Gomu no Tonkachi technique.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location where multiple new techniques are revealed.

keyEvents.title: Miss Goldenweek Reveals Colors Trap
keyEvents.description: Miss Goldenweek demonstrates her Colors Trap ability for the first time, hypnotizing Luffy with various colored symbols.
keyEvents.significance: Location where a significant non-Devil Fruit ability is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Crew Members Nearly Die in Wax Trap
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Nami, and Vivi are nearly completely encased in Mr. 3's deadly wax trap.
keyEvents.significance: High-stakes moment demonstrating the danger of the island's enemies.

description: A prehistoric island in the Grand Line where dinosaurs still roam and two giants, Dorry and Brogy, have been dueling for 100 years. The Straw Hat Pirates are currently battling Baroque Works agents on this island.
significance: The battleground for the conflict between the Straw Hat Pirates and Baroque Works Officer Agents Mr. 3, Miss Goldenweek, Mr. 5, and Miss Valentine.
